features: MEET GLITTER GIRL SARINIA: Sarinia brings a beautiful sparkle wherever she goes with her bright and delightful personality. This cutie loves fashion with hearts, spending time with her friends, and sharing fashion tips and fun facts with everyone!

GLITTER GIRLS DOLL: Sarinia has pretty bright brown eyes with long eyelashes, and her beautiful straight hair is a cute shade of brown. This poseable girl doll can stand up on flat surfaces or sit down. Her arms and legs can also bend for outfit changes.

DOLLS & ACCESSORIES: Your child will have hours of fun styling and dressing their baby doll collection with all of our Glitter Girls doll accessories. Glitter Girls doll clothes fit most 14-inch dolls. They’ll love letting their dolls shine!

IMAGINATIVE PLAY: Little brains develop best when they are engaged in play. Our fashion girl dolls encourage imaginative and pretend play to help improve concentration, memory, creativity, and discovery. Your little one will love our dolls!

GLITTER GIRLS: Bringing to life a world of creativity and fun, our dolls help children find the sparkle hidden in every day. Through their colorful fashion and vibrant personalities, Glitter Girls embrace friendship and encourage self-confidence.
body.description: Hours of fun and friendship await your little one with the Glitter Girls Sarinia Fashion Doll. Each of our girls’ fashion dolls encourages your child to let their imagination run wild, find their creative side, and build their self-esteem. From our stylish doll babies to their fabulous accessories, your children will love the endless possibilities that playtime will bring.Sarinia brings a beautiful sparkle wherever she goes with her bright and delightful personality. This sparkling 14-inch doll loves fashion with hearts, spending time with her friends, and sharing fashion tips and fun facts. Each of our dolls for girls comes with 1 complete outfit. Sarinia’s favorite outfit is a tunic with pink and white stripes and a bejeweled “G” on the front. (Is it “G” for Glitter Girls or “G” for Gorgeous? We think both!) She’s ready to dazzle the day or night away! Your little one can easily mix and match her outfit with other Glitter Girls accessories (sold separately). Stand out and be bright with Sarinia!Bringing to life a world of creativity and fun, the Glitter Girls help children find the sparkle hidden in every day. Through their colorful fashion and vibrant personalities, the Glitter Girls embrace friendship and encourage self-confidence. Whether they spend their days enjoying delicious sweets, riding into adventure, or traveling toward discovery, the Glitter Girls fill every child’s day with laughter and imagination. Remember, there’s always a dazzling adventure to be found in our colorful world! Go out and chase it with Glitter Girls!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Christmas Giving Tree
reviews.reviewText: Bought for community Christmas giving tree. Adorable doll and looked well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a very cute doll that is not as expensive as American Girl Doll but looks just as real. My daughter plays with this for hours and carries it everywhere. Her legs and arms can move back and forth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A gift for a 5 year old. She loves her new doll and Carrie’s it every where. She looks forward to buying clothes for her new friend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice for the Price
reviews.reviewText: I bought this doll for my daughter's 4th birthday primarily because it was inexpensive compared to similar dolls. I didn't want to pay a lot of money for a doll that might get ruined as my daughter is probably still a bit too young to take care of it properly but she really wanted a doll with long hair she could brush. This doll fits the bill. As expected, it is not the highest quality but it is good enough. My daughter loves her new "big girl doll" (as opposed to all of her other dolls which are baby dolls). I'm happy with the purchase and would definitely recommend for little girls who are not quite ready for the much more expensive 18 inch dolls (such as American Girl). It is a good "training/transition" doll so to speak.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I gave this doll to my granddaughter for Chrsimas, when she unwrapped it, she was so excited. The doll looks just like her, it was even wearing a shirt with the letter G on it. My granddaughter's name is Genesis, so she named the doll Genesis. I bought some outfits to go with the doll too. Everything is really wonderful, and high quality. I highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We love her
reviews.reviewText: Gifted to our kiddo n she absolutely loved it. Good size, not too big. And the soft body adds a more realistic play feel. Happy with our purchase.
Gave as gift to my Niece. I bought an additional set of clothes for the doll any my niece has been playing with it ever since she got it. Doll is cute and seems well made. Yes I would recommend it.

Poupée magnifique !Ma fille de presque 3 ans l'adore et ne l'a quitte plus. C'est super.Attention ses vêtements très près du corps, pas évident pour un enfant de l'habiller. C'est dommage.Sinon rien à dire de cette PoupéeIl en existe d'autres, je pense lui en prendre une deuxième de la même collection
Die schlanke Puppe ist niedlich und von der Größe, ca. wie eine Wasserflasche hoch.Es gibt verschiedene "Mädchen", blond, braun usw.
